channel.title: The Jeff and Steve Show
channel.description: The Jeff and Steve Show is a masterpiece of the filmmakers art. The show is now expanding into the new generation of podcast radio media.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Good comedy you need!
channel.itunes:author: Jeff & Steve

item.title: The Jeff and Steve Show - Volume 3 Videocast
item.description: This is the third video of our three part video series titled The Jeff & Steve Show. This video was created in October of 2005 and took about 3 days to complete. ~ Windows Media Video Format
item.dc:creator: Jeff & Steve
